graph_title: Average share of the built-up area of cities that is open space for public use for all, by sex, age and persons with disabilities
nazwa_wskaznika: 11.7.1 Average share of the built-up area of cities that is open space for public use for all, by sex, age and persons with disabilities
zadanie: 11.7 By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities
uwagi: Proxy indicator, available within the Polish public statistics. An original indicator, adopted by the UN for monitoring target 11.7 of the 2030 Agenda is 11.7.1 Average share of the built-up area of cities that is open space for public use for all, by age group, sex and persons with disabilities.
